bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: After the Civil War, Robert E. Lee was president of Washington College (presently Washington & Lee University) in Lexington Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The Robert E. Lee Collection is comprised of one personal letter, one portrait, and two reproduced photographs. The letter is from Lee to Reverend W.H. Braddus of Lexington, Virginia, regarding Lee's check for $30.00 which he wants Braddus to accept as payment of tuition for a member of Lexington's Craig family.
